Room.Name: Overland Drive/Nagaritha Drive Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Nagaritha Drive and Overland Drive.
Room.LongDescription: Overland drive is one of the longest streets in Oceancrest and has the unique feature of being the road which runs between the Manor of Natasha de Allisk and the mysterious Necropolis. Nagaritha Drive runs east and west from one end of the city to the other. On the southwest corner of the intersection is the local favorite, Thackery's Pub. The main entrance to the pub is on Nagaritha Drive, but there is also an entrance on Overland Drive.
